ie.gmit.computing

类 Pic_page

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ie.gmit.computing.Pic_page

  • public class Pic_page
extends Activity
    It is the last page that wiil shows the leaf node, selecting picture and save all the informations to SD card
    作者:
    Siyi_Kong
